ground_truth: Dillinger swaps looks with Gilbert, then shoves through a revolving door. Outside, he finds only a wealthy couple and a uniformed doorman. The gang leader glances around the sidewalk with a frown, then faces the doorman. Dillinger frowns. Now, a hood ornament of an archer gleams on Purvis' Pierce Arrow. In an FBI field office, a chubby agent shows a jacket. Purvis paces, then addresses his assembled task force. He faces a secretary. Purvis gazes out a window at a neighboring high rise, then faces his men. One agent briefly drops his gaze. Now in a telephone exchange with Baum, he plays a 78 record. Night time. Dillinger strides past a bright city park. Later, he marches through a crowded arch vaulted lobby. He finds Billie behind a hatcheck counter. She notices Dillinger as a male guest holds out his coat to her. Dillinger smacks the back of the bystander's head. As the man doubles over, the crime boss flips open the counter's pass-through and steps into Billie's work area. Yanking the man's wrist over the counter, Dillinger snatches his claim ticket. Billie stares as he finds the man's coat. The exotic beauty drops her gaze, and Dillinger throws the coat at its owner. He gets Billie's coat. He holds her coat open. Billie eyes it, then looks to a staring co-worker. With a coy smirk, she steps out from behind the counter and slips into her coat. Now, in an apartment, a hand drops a rabbit's foot key chain by a tabletop sculpture of two racing greyhounds. Dillinger leads Billie down a hall into a luxurious living room. As she takes in the space, he sets a chair near a sofa and looks to her. Billie joins him, slipping off her coat. Dillinger sets a simple cardboard box on the coffee table. Billie complies and looks around with a faint smile. Behind her, Red appears in his undershirt and leans through an open-air interior window. He gets a couple of glasses from a counter, then saunters off with two women. Dillinger sits facing Billie and lays his hand on the large box. The exotic beauty eyes it coolly. Dillinger allows a subdued smile, then shifts boyishly in his seat. Billie removes the lid, finding forest green tissue paper over the contents. Folding back the layers, she finds a camel-haired coat with a thick fur collar. Billie lifts the present from its box, staring at it. She swallows, then raises her tender gaze to meet Dillinger's. Her full lips curl into a smile. The crime boss grins. They gaze into each other's eyes. Later, on a bed, they smother each other with kisses. Silhouetted against a window, Billie leans over the reclined man, her bobbed hair tickling his brow.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Dillinger swaps looks with Gilbert, then pushes through a revolving door. Outside, he sees only a wealthy couple and a uniformed doorman. He scans the sidewalk with a frown, then turns to the doorman. Meanwhile, a hood ornament of an archer gleams on Purvis' Pierce Arrow. At an FBI office, a chubby agent displays a jacket. Purvis paces, addresses his task force, faces a secretary, then looks out at a nearby high rise before returning his gaze to the team. One agent briefly looks down. At a phone exchange with Baum, he plays a 78 record.   At night, Dillinger walks past a lit city park, then through a crowded, vaulted lobby. At the hatcheck counter, he spots Billie as a male guest offers her his coat. Dillinger smacks the man's head, makes him double over, flips open the pass-through, and steps into Billie's space. He yanks the man’s wrist, grabs his claim ticket, finds his coat, and tosses it back. Billie watches as Dillinger gets her coat and holds it open. She glances at a coworker, then with a coy smirk, slips it on.  In an apartment, a hand drops a rabbit’s foot key chain beside a sculpture of two racing greyhounds. Dillinger leads Billie down a hallway into a plush living room. As she looks around, he sets a chair near the sofa. She joins him, slipping off her coat. Dillinger places a cardboard box on the coffee table. Billie looks around with a faint smile. Behind her, Red, in an undershirt, leans through a window, grabs glasses, and walks off with two women. Dillinger faces Billie, resting his hand on the box. She eyes it coolly. He offers a soft smile and shifts in his seat. Billie lifts the lid to reveal forest green tissue, uncovering a camel-haired coat with a thick fur collar. She lifts it, swallows, and meets Dillinger’s gaze with a smile. He grins. They lock eyes.  Later, on a bed, they kiss passionately. Silhouetted in the window light, Billie leans over him, her bobbed hair brushing his brow.

Purvis paces, addresses his task force, faces a secretary, gazes out a window, then faces his men. An agent briefly drops his gaze. In a phone exchange with Baum, he plays a 78 record. Nighttime, Dillinger strides past a city park, then through a crowded lobby. They gaze into each other's eyes. Later, on a bed, they kiss. Silhouetted, Billie leans over Dillinger, her hair tickling his brow.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Dillinger exchanges a meaningful look with Gilbert, then forcefully pushes his way through a revolving door. Once outside, he encounters only a wealthy couple and a uniformed doorman standing nearby. The gang leader casts a searching glance around the bustling sidewalk, his expression clouded with a frown, before turning his attention to the doorman. Dillinger's frown deepens. Meanwhile, the hood ornament of an archer shines brightly on Purvis' elegant Pierce Arrow. In a nearby FBI field office, a chubby agent displays a jacket. Purvis paces back and forth, then addresses his assembled task force with authority. He turns to face a secretary. Purvis gazes thoughtfully out a window at a neighboring high-rise building, then turns back to face his men. One agent momentarily lowers his gaze. Now engaged in a telephone exchange with Baum, he plays a 78 record. As night falls, Dillinger strides confidently past a brightly lit city park. Later, he marches purposefully through a crowded, arch-vaulted lobby. He spots Billie working behind a hatcheck counter. She notices Dillinger as a male guest extends his coat to her. Dillinger abruptly smacks the back of the bystander's head. As the man doubles over in surprise, the crime boss deftly flips open the counter's pass-through and steps into Billie's work area. Grabbing the man's wrist over the counter, Dillinger swiftly snatches his claim ticket. Billie watches in astonishment as he retrieves the man's coat. The exotic beauty lowers her gaze, and Dillinger tosses the coat back to its owner. He retrieves Billie's coat and holds it open for her. Billie eyes the coat, then glances at a co-worker who is staring at the scene. With a coy smirk, she steps out from behind the counter and gracefully slips into her coat. Now, in an apartment, a hand casually drops a rabbit's foot keychain beside a tabletop sculpture of two racing greyhounds. Dillinger leads Billie down a hallway into a luxurious living room. As she takes in the opulent space, he sets a chair near a plush sofa and looks at her expectantly. Billie joins him, slipping off her coat with ease. Dillinger places a simple cardboard box on the coffee table. Billie complies and looks around the room with a faint, appreciative smile. Behind her, Red appears in his undershirt, leaning through an open-air interior window. He retrieves a couple of glasses from a counter, then saunters off with two women in tow. Dillinger sits facing Billie and places his hand on the large box. The exotic beauty eyes it with a cool curiosity. Dillinger allows a subdued smile to cross his face, then shifts boyishly in his seat. Billie removes the lid, revealing forest green tissue paper covering the contents. Carefully folding back the layers, she discovers a luxurious camel-haired coat with a thick fur collar. Billie lifts the exquisite present from its box, staring at it in awe. She swallows, then raises her tender gaze to meet Dillinger's. Her full lips curl into a warm smile. The crime boss grins in response. They gaze deeply into each other's eyes. Later, on a bed, they passionately smother each other with kisses. Silhouetted against a window, Billie leans over the reclined man, her bobbed hair gently tickling his brow.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Dillinger, with a significant and telling look, exchanges a glance with Gilbert before he resolutely pushes his way through the revolving door with forceful determination. Once outside, his path crosses with that of only a couple exuding wealth and an impeccably uniformed doorman standing in close proximity. As the prominent gang leader casts a searching and scrutinizing glance around the lively and bustling sidewalk, his face becomes shadowed and clouded with a frown of contemplation. He eventually directs his focused attention toward the doorman, and his brow furrows even more deeply. Meanwhile, the hood ornament shaped like an archer gleams brightly on the elegant and sophisticated Pierce Arrow owned by Purvis. In a nearby FBI field office, a portly and chubby agent holds up and displays a jacket. Purvis, with a sense of urgency, paces back and forth and then addresses his gathered task force with confidence and authority. He turns to engage with a secretary, then gazes thoughtfully out the window at a neighboring high-rise building before turning back to face his men. One agent, momentarily overwhelmed, lowers his gaze. Now engaged in a telephone exchange with Baum, he plays a 78 record in the background. As night descends upon the city, Dillinger strides confidently down the street, passing by a city park that is brightly lit, bringing vibrancy to the scene. Later, he marches with purpose through a bustling and crowded lobby characterized by its arch-vaulted ceilings. He spots Billie working diligently behind a hatcheck counter. She notices Dillinger as a male guest extends his coat towards her. Dillinger unexpectedly smacks the back of the bystander's head with abruptness. As the man bends over in surprise, the crime boss deftly flips open the counter's pass-through and steps boldly into Billie's work area. Grabbing the man's wrist with intent over the counter, Dillinger swiftly snatches the claim ticket from his grasp. Billie watches this in astonishment, her eyes wide, as he retrieves the man's coat with efficiency. The exotic beauty lowers her gaze, and Dillinger nonchalantly tosses the coat back to its surprised owner. He then retrieves Billie's coat and holds it open for her with chivalrous intent. Billie eyes the coat, then glances at a co-worker who is staring at the unfolding scene. With a coy and playful smirk, she steps out from behind the counter and gracefully slips into her coat. Now, in an apartment setting, a hand casually drops a rabbit's foot keychain beside a tabletop sculpture depicting two racing greyhounds. Dillinger leads Billie down a hallway into a luxurious and opulent living room. As she takes in the grandeur of the space, he sets a chair near a plush and inviting sofa, looking at her with anticipation. Billie joins him, slipping off her coat with elegant ease. Dillinger places a simple cardboard box on the coffee table with a sense of mystery. Billie complies and looks around the room with a faint yet appreciative smile. Behind her, Red appears in his undershirt, leaning through an open-air interior window. He retrieves a couple of glasses from a nearby counter, then saunters off with two women accompanying him. Dillinger sits facing Billie and places his hand on the large box with a sense of significance. The exotic beauty eyes the box with a cool and collected curiosity. Dillinger allows a subdued smile to play across his face, shifting boyishly in his seat. Billie removes the lid with careful anticipation, revealing forest green tissue paper covering the box's contents. With careful hands, she folds back the layers to reveal a luxurious camel-haired coat adorned with a thick and sumptuous fur collar. Billie lifts the exquisite gift from its box, her eyes filled with awe and wonder. She swallows with emotion, then raises her tender gaze to meet Dillinger’s expectant eyes. Her full lips curl into a warm and sincere smile. The crime boss grins in response, his own expression filled with warmth. They remain locked in a deep gaze into each other’s eyes, a moment of connection. Later, on a bed, they passionately smother each other with kisses under the dim light. Silhouetted against the window, Billie leans over the reclined man, her bobbed hair gently tickling his brow in an intimate gesture.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Dillinger exchanges a meaningful look with Gilbert, their eyes locking briefly before he decisively pushes his way through the revolving door, feeling the resistance of the glass panels as they spin around him. Once outside, he scans the area, his eyes quickly taking in the scene where only a wealthy couple and a uniformed doorman are present. His gaze sweeps across the sidewalk, his expression turning into a frown as he processes the absence of what he expected to find. Turning his attention to the doorman, Dillinger's frown deepens, reflecting his dissatisfaction. Meanwhile, the hood ornament of an archer on Purvis' Pierce Arrow catches the light, gleaming prominently. In a different setting, within an FBI field office, a chubby agent holds up a jacket for inspection. Purvis, filled with restless energy, paces back and forth before addressing his assembled task force, his voice commanding attention. He then turns to face a secretary, his gaze momentarily shifting to the window where he looks out at a neighboring high rise, contemplating the view before refocusing on his men. One agent, feeling the weight of the moment, briefly drops his gaze. In a telephone exchange with Baum, Purvis plays a 78 record, the music filling the space. As night falls, Dillinger strides confidently past a brightly lit city park, the lights casting shadows on his path. Later, he marches with purpose through a crowded arch-vaulted lobby, his eyes scanning the area until he spots Billie behind a hatcheck counter. She notices him just as a male guest extends his coat to her. Without hesitation, Dillinger smacks the back of the bystander's head, causing the man to double over in surprise. Seizing the opportunity, Dillinger flips open the counter's pass-through and steps into Billie's work area with a swift motion. He yanks the man's wrist over the counter, deftly snatching his claim ticket. Billie watches in astonishment as Dillinger locates the man's coat. The exotic beauty lowers her gaze, processing the scene, while Dillinger tosses the coat back to its owner with a dismissive gesture. He retrieves Billie's coat, holding it open invitingly. Billie glances at the coat, then at a co-worker who is staring at the unfolding drama. With a coy smirk, she steps out from behind the counter and gracefully slips into her coat. In a new setting, within an apartment, a hand casually drops a rabbit's foot key chain beside a tabletop sculpture of two racing greyhounds. Dillinger leads Billie down a hallway into a luxurious living room, where she pauses to take in the opulent surroundings. He sets a chair near a sofa, looking to her for approval. Billie joins him, removing her coat and draping it over the chair. Dillinger places a simple cardboard box on the coffee table, inviting her curiosity. Billie complies, her eyes scanning the room with a faint smile. Behind her, Red appears in his undershirt, leaning through an open-air interior window. He retrieves a couple of glasses from a counter and saunters off with two women, leaving Dillinger and Billie alone. Dillinger sits facing Billie, resting his hand on the large box, his demeanor relaxed yet expectant. The exotic beauty eyes the box coolly, her curiosity piqued. Dillinger allows a subdued smile to play on his lips, shifting boyishly in his seat as Billie removes the lid, revealing forest green tissue paper covering the contents. She carefully folds back the layers, uncovering a camel-haired coat with a thick fur collar. Billie lifts the present from its box, her eyes widening as she stares at it in awe. She swallows, her emotions welling up, and raises her tender gaze to meet Dillinger's, her full lips curling into a smile of gratitude. The crime boss grins back, their eyes locking in a moment of shared understanding. Later, on a bed, they are enveloped in each other's embrace, smothering each other with kisses. Silhouetted against a window, Billie leans over the reclined man, her bobbed hair gently tickling his brow as they lose themselves in the intimacy of the moment.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Dillinger exchanges a look with Gilbert before pushing through a revolving door to find only a wealthy couple and a doorman outside. He surveys the sidewalk with a frown, then turns to the doorman. Meanwhile, Purvis, in an FBI field office, paces and addresses his task force, occasionally glancing out the window at a high rise. He engages in a phone exchange with Baum while playing a record. At night, Dillinger walks past a city park and through a crowded lobby to find Billie at a hatcheck counter. He disrupts a guest by hitting him, takes his claim ticket, and retrieves the man's coat. Dillinger then gets Billie's coat, holding it open for her. With a smirk, she steps out from behind the counter and puts it on. Later, in an apartment, Dillinger leads Billie into a luxurious living room. As she admires the space, he sets a chair near a sofa and presents a cardboard box. Billie opens it to find a camel-haired coat with a fur collar. She lifts the coat, smiles tenderly at Dillinger, and they share a warm gaze. Later, on a bed, they kiss passionately, with Billie leaning over Dillinger, her hair brushing his brow.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Dillinger, a notorious bank robber during the Great Depression era, swaps looks with Gilbert, then shoves through a revolving door. Outside, he finds only a wealthy couple, likely patrons of this upscale establishment, and a uniformed doorman who stands watch at the elegant entrance. The gang leader glances around the sidewalk with a frown, then faces the doorman, who remains impassive. Dillinger frowns. Now, a hood ornament of an archer gleams on Purvis' Pierce Arrow, a luxury car favored by influential figures of the time. In an FBI field office, a chubby agent shows a jacket, evidence perhaps, to his colleagues. Purvis, a dedicated federal agent known for pursuing Dillinger, paces, then addresses his assembled task force, a determined group assembled for this high-profile case. He faces a secretary, noting any updates. Purvis gazes out a window at a neighboring high-rise, emblematic of the urban sprawl, then faces his men. One agent briefly drops his gaze, feeling the weight of the mission. Now in a telephone exchange with Baum, he plays a 78 record, the common format for music in the 1930s. Nighttime descends as Dillinger strides past a bright city park, likely one of Chicago's famed public spaces. Later, he marches through a crowded arch-vaulted lobby, bustling with the city's nightlife. He finds Billie behind a hatcheck counter, well-groomed but weary from her shift. She notices Dillinger as a male guest, perhaps a businessman, holds out his coat to her. Dillinger smacks the back of the bystander's head. As the man doubles over, the crime boss flips open the counter's pass-through, demonstrating his brazen audacity, and steps into Billie's work area. Yanking the man's wrist over the counter, Dillinger snatches his claim ticket with a deftness that speaks to his criminal expertise. Billie stares as he finds the man's coat. The exotic beauty, known for her striking looks, drops her gaze, and Dillinger throws the coat at its owner. He gets Billie's coat, a cherished piece amidst her limited wardrobe. He holds her coat open. Billie eyes it, then looks to a staring co-worker who is taken aback by Dillinger's presence. With a coy smirk, she steps out from behind the counter and slips into her coat. Now, in an apartment, a hand drops a rabbit's foot key chain, a common charm for luck, by a tabletop sculpture of two racing greyhounds, possibly reflecting Dillinger's taste or status. Dillinger leads Billie down a hall into a luxurious living room, a stark contrast to her modest lifestyle. As she takes in the space, he sets a chair near a sofa and looks to her. Billie joins him, slipping off her coat. Dillinger sets a simple cardboard box on the coffee table, concealing a gift. Billie complies and looks around with a faint smile, appreciating the setting. Behind her, Red appears in his undershirt, casually at home, and leans through an open-air interior window. He gets a couple of glasses from a counter, then saunters off with two women, their laughter echoing in the background. Dillinger sits facing Billie and lays his hand on the large box, the moment tinged with anticipation. The exotic beauty eyes it coolly. Dillinger allows a subdued smile, then shifts boyishly in his seat, eager for her reaction. Billie removes the lid, finding forest green tissue paper over the contents, a luxurious touch. Folding back the layers, she finds a camel-haired coat with a thick fur collar, a fashionable and extravagant gift of the era. Billie lifts the present from its box, staring at it with a mix of awe and gratitude. She swallows, then raises her tender gaze to meet Dillinger's. Her full lips curl into a smile. The crime boss grins. They gaze into each other's eyes, momentarily escaping the reality of their lives. Later, on a bed, they smother each other with kisses, lost in their love. Silhouetted against a window overlooking the city skyline, Billie leans over the reclined man, her bobbed hair tickling his brow, a tender moment in their tumultuous world.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Dillinger swaps looks with Gilbert then shoves through a revolving door. Outside he finds only a wealthy couple and a uniformed doorman. The gang leader glances around the sidewalk with a frown then faces the doorman. Dillinger frowns. Now a hood ornament of an archer gleams on Purvis' Pierce Arrow. In an FBI field office a chubby agent shows a jacket. Purvis paces then addresses his assembled task force. He faces a secretary. Purvis gazes out a window at a neighboring high rise then faces his men. One agent briefly drops his gaze. Now in a telephone exchange with Baum he plays a 78 record. Night time. Dillinger strides past a bright city park. Later he marches through a crowded arch vaulted lobby. He finds Billie behind a hatcheck counter. She notices Dillinger as a male guest holds out his coat to her. Dillinger smacks the back of the bystander's head. As the man doubles over the crime boss flips open the counter's passthrough and steps into Billie's work area. Yanking the man's wrist over the counter. Dillinger snatches his claim ticket. Billie stares as he finds the man's coat. The exotic beauty drops her gaze and Dillinger throws the coat at its owner. He gets Billie's coat. He holds her coat open. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. Billie eyes it then looks to a staring coworker. With a coy smirk she steps out from behind the counter and slips into her coat. Now in an apartment a hand drops a rabbit's foot key chain by a tabletop sculpture of two racing greyhounds. Dillinger leads Billie down a hall into a luxurious living room. As she takes in the space he sets a chair near a sofa and looks to her. Billie joins him slipping off her coat. Dillinger sets a simple cardboard box on the coffee table. Billie complies and looks around with a faint smile. Behind her. Red appears in his undershirt and leans through an openair interior window. He gets a couple of glasses from a counter then saunters off with two women. Dillinger sits facing Billie and lays his hand on the large box. The exotic beauty eyes it coolly. Dillinger allows a subdued smile then shifts boyishly in his seat. Billie removes the lid finding forest green tissue paper over the contents. Folding back the layers she finds a camelhaired coat with a thick fur collar. Billie lifts the present from its box staring at it. She swallows then raises her tender gaze to meet Dillinger's. Her full lips curl into a smile. The crime boss grins. They gaze into each other's eyes. Later on a bed they smother each other with kisses. Silhouetted against a window. Billie leans over the reclined man her bobbed hair tickling his brow.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Dillinger swaps looks with Gilbert then shoves through a revolving door. Outside he finds only a wealthy couple and a uniformed doorman. The gang leader glances around the sidewalk with a frown then faces the doorman. Dillinger frowns. Now a hood ornament of an archer gleams on Purvis' Pierce Arrow. In an FBI field office a chubby agent shows a jacket. Purvis paces then addresses his assembled task force. He faces a secretary. Purvis gazes out a window at a neighboring high rise then faces his men. One agent briefly drops his gaze. Now in a telephone exchange with Baum he plays a 78 record. Night time. Dillinger strides past a bright city park. Later he marches through a crowded arch vaulted lobby. He finds Billie behind a hatcheck counter. She notices Dillinger as a male guest holds out his coat to her. Dillinger smacks the back of the bystander's head. As the man doubles over the crime boss flips open the counter's passthrough and steps into Billie's work area. Yanking the man's wrist over the counter. Dillinger snatches his claim ticket. Billie stares as he finds the man's coat. The exotic beauty drops her gaze and Dillinger throws the coat at its owner. He gets Billie's coat. He holds her coat open. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Baxter trades glances with Lennox, then barges through a sliding gate. Inside, he encounters only a humble trio and a scruffy gardener. The scoutmaster scans the courtyard with a smile, then turns to the gardener. Baxter smiles. Meanwhile, the emblem of a lion shines on Carter's Cadillac. In a police precinct, a lanky officer flaunts a scarf. Carter stomps, then lectures his gathered band. He turns to a barista. Carter peers out a door at a distant skyscraper, then turns to his crew. One officer momentarily lifts his gaze. Now in a library discussion with Smith, he flips a calendar page. Daytime. Baxter ambles past a dim alleyway. Earlier, he sauntered through an empty dome-shaped passage. He encounters Mary beside a ticket booth. She spots Baxter while a female patron holds out her bag to him. Baxter pats the top of the shopper’s hat. As the woman stands upright, the ringmaster flings open the booth's panel and walks into Mary's workspace. Tugging the woman's hat over the counter, Baxter snatches her receipt. Mary gapes as he discovers the woman’s hat. The plain clerk lifts her gaze, and Baxter hands the hat to its owner. He obtains Mary’s hat. He holds her hat aloft. Mary observes it, then glances at a yawning spectator. With a playful wink, she steps from behind the booth and slips on her hat. Later, in a cafe, a hand places a seashell amulet beside a wooden sculpture of three leaping dolphins. Baxter guides Mary through a walkway into a modest drawing room. As she examines the area, he arranges a lamp near a painting and glances at her. Mary joins him, removing her hat. Baxter lays a colorful puzzle on the dining table. Mary obeys and glances around with a gentle sigh. Nearby, Blue emerges in his blazer and leans through an open-air interior archway. He collects a few herbs from a shelf, then wanders off with two men. Baxter reclines opposite Mary and sets his foot on the small puzzle. The plain clerk observes it indifferently. Baxter allows a gentle chuckle, then shifts slowly on his cushion. Mary lifts the cover, revealing scarlet silk wrapping around the parcels. Unfolding the wrappers, she finds a satin scarf with delicate lace edges. Mary removes the gift from its wrapping, examining it. She breathes deeply, then lifts her serious gaze to meet Baxter's. Her thin lips part into a grin. The ringmaster beams. They lock eyes. Earlier, on a chair, they engulf each other with embraces. Framed against a wall, Mary bends over the seated man, her flowing hair brushing his chin.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Dillinger exchanges a look with Gilbert before pushing through a revolving door, only to find a wealthy couple and a doorman outside. He scans the area, while Purvis, in an FBI office, organizes his team. Dillinger walks through a vibrant city park and a bustling lobby, finding Billie at a hatcheck counter. He confronts a male guest and retrieves Billie's coat, helping her into it. In an apartment, Dillinger leads Billie to a luxurious living room. He presents her with a gift—a camel-haired coat with a fur collar. Billie, touched, smiles at Dillinger. Later, they share a tender moment on a bed, with Billie leaning over him affectionately.
